channel.title: Search War Terrorism Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Search War Terrorism Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: fear..
item.description: I have a cynical view on terrorism. I feel that a lot of what we hear and see form the media.. could be government propaganda. I mean it also could be real. you really never know. Today is a good example. Sen. Patrick Leahy is investigating whether west nile virus is part of a terrorist plot. This could be a good chance for the government to just be like “yea it is… and we need more money.
